(I travelled to USA from Türkiye)-If the time ends and customer buy additional plan, I suggest you to transfer unused data to new plan.Thanks.

Review.Titre: e-sim worked flawlessly but pricey
Very easy to use
Review.Contenu: Very easy to use. Only downside was having to use another device to scan the QR code. Setting up the manual way was not straightforward but once I had scanned the QR code, the instructions were great and the esim worked perfectly

Review.Titre: Family room
Review.Contenu: Family room Great location for tsujiri market, local restaurants and stations. But the bed is hard cause of a single thin twin mattress.

Review.Titre: Easy to activate and use. Data service was usually good.
Review.Contenu: I got the Europe e-sim for vacation. It was super easy to install and activate (did that the morning I left, while still in the US, just in case). There were a few times I didn't have service when I wanted it or it was very slow - a few times in fairly busy cities, and a few times in more remote areas - but overall it was good.

Review.Titre: Good coverage and fast internet signal
Review.Contenu: Good coverage and fast internet signal. Very happy. The only improvement is that your fee is a bit high

Review.Titre: Very recommended for travelling in…
Review.Contenu: Very recommended for travelling in Europe. They have good support in case something goes wrong. Make sure you follow the instructions properly after purchasing your plan

Review.Titre: Easy to install and activate
Review.Contenu: Easy to install and activate. Only criticism I can give is lagging sometimes. Reception wise. I would say 85% of times no issues. Only 15% of time.it lagged. Also.value for money. Didn't have to worry about kids rinsing the normal.data allowance you get from roaming.

Review.Titre: Easy access, but…
Review.Contenu: Easy access, however the only thing  it didn’t work with was as our air BandB hosts security. We had to mobile connect and wait for a secure response on our phone number. It didn’t appear to work.

Review.Titre: The app is overall great
Review.Contenu: The app is overall great, easy to use and offers good deals. Coverage in Greece is not ideal- although to be fair, the app advises you to check reception and network coverage before buying a plan. All in all, I am happy and would use Nomad again.

Review.Titre: Nomad is a great and simple E Sim card…
Review.Contenu: Nomad is a great and simple E Sim card solution. It worked for me very conveniently while I was traveling in France. It was very easy to set up. My only complaint is that it really went through the gigabits if I left it on. I was not using it for high data applications. I found the best way to deal with its voracious appetite would be to only turn it on just for the time I needed it and shut it off right away.

Review.Titre: Works and is cheap
Review.Contenu: Works and is cheap. Cuts out sometimes, but that might be my phone or operator error on my part

Review.Titre: A very simple app to use
Review.Contenu: A very simple app to use. I just wish that it covered more countries as competitors offer more options. Pricing can also be a bit steep. However it’s much then coming back home to £100 plus a bill for roaming.

Review.Titre: not so easy to set up but once done was…
Review.Contenu: not so easy to set up but once done was very easy to use and very handy being able to keep track of how much data you use - I bought 20GB for a 10 day trip to Thailand and used less than 5GB so next time will purchase less.

Review.Titre: Recommended E-Sim, good service
Review.Contenu: I recommend this E-Sim since I was visiting several ports on the cruise and if I managed to connect, sometimes the connection was a little slow, in some places there were several hours before the ship arrived at a port and I managed to have connectivity, which was excellent. I will have another trip soon and I have already bought the E-Sim from Europe again.

Review.Titre: Overall worked well
Review.Contenu: Overall worked well, sometimes didn’t even though my partner’s nomad worked and vice versa. Wish there was a voice call option for calling hotels, taxis etc

Review.Titre: Not easy to get started with
Review.Contenu: I had a lot of problems loading up the esim and getting it to work, it would been helpful in the instructions had they highlighted that I would need to turn on data roaming for the new sim. I also found the lack of a local telephone number very difficult as I could not hat texts to load up local taxi apps

Review.Titre: Good concept and services
Review.Contenu: Experienced problems activating the account for Armenia. It wasn't communicated well to do that in the app, and the account took some time to come to life. After the activation, the eSIM worked well most of the time, but the data reception was poor more often than I expected. Might however be because of generally lower stsandards in Armenia. Switching between data providers was beneficial, it helped to stabilize the connection in the end.

Review.Titre: Nice one, keep up the good work!!!
Review.Contenu: The experience using your product was quite nice!I didn't need to start looking for how to go on the net because it was right there on my phone!

Review.Titre: A valuable experience.
Review.Contenu: This data solution was a valuable experience for use in USA, using an iPhone 14: in the places visited, it was excellent in cities, using 5G or 4G networks and weak in inland areas (no signal in many places in the western national parks). Excellent at automatic installation and activation (beginning with a QR code) and sharing data via personal hotspot. I recommend.

Review.Titre: Overall good but wish service coverage was a bit better
Review.Contenu: Overall good but better in the cities. Service was much spottier and more limited in rural areas/when travelling through the mountains in comparison with local cell service providers. Only wished that the service coverage was more comparable to a Canadian SIM.

Review.Titre: Great value
Review.Contenu: Great value, easy to use (if you get the app, otherwise you need a second device, for Android at least). Coverage can be a bit patchy but hard to tell if that's Nomad or the NZ telco networks.

Review.Titre: Easy to set up and reliable
Review.Contenu: Easy to set up and connectivity was very good.  I had problems connecting and Setring up with holafly so I changed to nomad and nomads feature to connect automatically is brilliant.

Review.Titre: I got 20GB and it was more than enough
Review.Contenu: I got 20GB and it was more than enough! I used it all the time during 16 days and I consumed only half of it. The service was always good, except in Germany where was very slow and intermittent.

Review.Titre: The data worked in all 3 countries that…
Review.Contenu: The data worked in all 3 countries that I visited and it was great that I didn't have to change SIM cards.  The only issue was that I had to reboot/log off/on again when I went from one country to another country.

Review.Titre: Coverage has always been good
Review.Contenu: Coverage has always been good, speed not always excellent.In Kuala Lumpur and southern cities well, on the east coast and north less so

Review.Titre: e-sim worked in Canada and America…
Review.Contenu: e-sim worked in Canada and America effortlessly! Very handy for route and music in the rental. Easy to install!

Review.Titre: Technically
Review.Contenu: Technically, so simple to operate. It just worked. Plan choice was a bit hard for me. A 9 day  holiday in Indonesia, that has WIFI everywhere. So what do I choose?  I chose thé 3 GB regular plan. I should have chosen the 5GB or 10GB plan.

Review.Titre: I really like this E sim
Review.Contenu: I really like this E sim. It’s so easy to activate. It’s great. The only thing I didn’t like is I didn’t get the number just in case I need to communicate with families or friends.

Review.Titre: Works great but didn’t notify me before reaching my data limit
Review.Contenu: I never got notified that I was reaching my data limit and had to figure out why my data suddenly stopped working and then look for wifi to buy a new package AND install a new esim instead of simply upgrading my existing plan before it expired. Other than that it was a good service overall.

Review.Titre: Pretty seamless experience in Hong…
Review.Contenu: Pretty seamless experience in Hong Kong. In Vietnam I have to turn on data roaming to gain access.

Review.Titre: Great app, great prices, good datapackages
Review.Contenu: I like the simplicity of the app and installation process. The prices were very good for the unlimited and limited packages. A option I was missing in korea was an unlimited package for 30 days.

Review.Titre: The activation took several hours
Review.Contenu: The activation took several hours, it wasn’t until the next that the data started to work. Online it said it was activated but it wasn’t. Otherwise the service was good and fast.

Review.Titre: It is a great tool!
Review.Contenu: It is a great tool!Coverage all over the places we went, but with some fluctuations in Paris.

Review.Titre: Very nice
Review.Contenu: Sometimes , we d'on't have enough connectivity for sending a message on messenger, it was very rarely. This is a realy good service for have data in USA.

Review.Titre: Best eSIM for your NZ holiday
Review.Contenu: As of December 2023, Spark is Nomad’s NZ partner service. I got through 95% of South Island with this service and can confidently say it has the best uptime. My family and I decided to use different providers between the big three to make sure someone had a connection throughout the road trip for Google Maps. For best bang for your buck, I bought the 15 GB and only needed around 6 GB for a 8-day itinerary. To be honest I was gaming a fair bit so you could probably get away with less.

Review.Titre: Hassle free!
Review.Contenu: Process to purchase and install an e-sim for travel was smooth and hassle free.Did not take long to get onto the target network upon arrival. After that it was good network connectivity though the entire trip

Review.Titre: Crossed the border into usa from…
Review.Contenu: Crossed the border into usa from canada,worked immediately,drove through several states into florida and no problems!! My canadian carrier wanted $13 a day for data,will be dropping them as soon as i get home.

Review.Titre: Works amazingly!
Review.Contenu: It's worked so well in every Asian country I've been to (Hong Kong, China and South Korea), it works almost instantly every time I land in a new one. Strong connection. Absolutely would get it again!

Review.Titre: Awesome App
Review.Contenu: Awesome App. Saves a lot of time and you can use it straight after landing. Very convenient und easy to use. Definitely recommend it for frequent travelers.

Review.Titre: very convenient and reasonable e-sim purchase and utilization experience
Review.Contenu: I only ordered a data plan without a phone number (calling minutes) so the e-sim was provided almost instantly. the installation process was so easy and straightforward and so was the activation. I liked Nomad's feature that shows how much data I did use from my purchased plan. that helped me with pacing and optimizing my utilization of the data. I also got a notification to top-up when I used more than 60% of my plan. That can become handy in the future and I intend to buy more from them in the future.

Review.Titre: Easy to activate and good coverage
Review.Contenu: The eSIM loaded on the phone and activated on arrival in the UK. The coverage has been good with data available as we travel around. My teenage son is very happy. All has worked well.

Review.Titre: Great way to keep in touch while…
Review.Contenu: Great way to keep in touch while traveling. Wish there was a full user manual for those that aren’t tech savvy but we did get it to work ok. Some messages weren’t getting through but I am sure that is on me.

Review.Titre: Fab service and smooth experience
Review.Contenu: Fab service and smooth experience. I've purchased a plan ahead of my UAE trip. I have activated my eSIMa day before and it started working 3 minutes after I've landed in UAE.

Review.Titre: A bit expensive but great service
Review.Contenu: The speed of Nomad was superb in Canada. Much better then the Airlo one. Instalation also very easy. It is just a bit too expensive but you pay for the convenience.

Review.Titre: Seamless Connectivity, Great Prices, Ultimate Travel Companion!
Review.Contenu: Nomad has been a game-changer for me! I’ve never experienced a loss of connection, and the prices are fantastic. The service is incredibly easy to use, making it a breeze to manage multiple mobile numbers. It’s a real lifesaver when traveling – so convenient!

Review.Titre: First time user
Review.Contenu: Super easy to use No issues with connectivity, signal strength or up and down / load speedsA bit on the pricey side compared to wireless router but most affordable out of all the other competing e-sim options (even after discount)

Review.Titre: Easy way to book an esim
Review.Contenu: Easy way to book an esim, multiple ways to pay, good overall package.  Highly recommended.

Review.Titre: Amazing E-Sim card
Review.Contenu: Amazing E-Sim card. We have used it throughout Europe with no issues and will use it when we go to South America. Couldn't be happier. Has made travelling and staying in touch seamless.

Review.Titre: I saw the sponsored ads in social…
Review.Contenu: I saw the sponsored ads in social media, luckily the first of various. I downloaded the app as soon as I landed at the airport. The whole process was straightforward & very easy even for non-tech savvy I’d say. So the user-friendliness is great with their UI/UX. My family & I went for Asia trip so my favourite feature is definitely the regional plan; skip all the tedious & hassle tasks.

Review.Titre: From now on I will use Nomad on all trips
Review.Contenu: It's so simple to use and you get a clear step-by-step plan to get everything in order. What a solution this is! and many times cheaper than through your own provider! From now on I will use Nomad on all trips outside the EU.

Review.Titre: First class app and service
Review.Contenu: First class app and service. Have used this twice in last few months, in Europe (mainly Ireland) and Easy Asia (Taiwan). Best to setup before you depart as it's easiest if you can scan the QR code for setup of your esim. Had no downtime while using the esim which is contracted to good telcos when you're travelling

Review.Titre: This is my firsttime using esim
Review.Contenu: This is my firsttime using esim, and it works great in my stay in the phillippines.

Review.Titre: I'm loving eSim data.
Review.Contenu: Been using Nomad eSim for daily data on my phone for 2 months. I only use it when not at home. I'm surprised how well it has worked for voip & data texting. Goodbye cell phone provider hello data provider.

Review.Titre: Everything worked great
Review.Contenu: Everything worked great. As an improvement it would be great to have it clearer how to add a new data plan instead of a new eSIM.

Review.Titre: Just a really convenient service and…
Review.Contenu: Just a really convenient service and affordable. Seemed to work in every area I was in and I like the fact it doesn’t start until you land in the country of usage.

Review.Titre: Easy and practical experience
Review.Contenu: Easy to hire, track data usage and decent speeds in the US. Except for a specific situation where not having phone and text services was an issue, this is far better and cost-effective than buying a US sim card from a carrier. Highly recommend!

Review.Titre: Turkey eSim
Review.Contenu: I bought Nomad eSIM when I traveled to Turkey. Very easy and smooth process to install and activate eSIM. It worked like a breeze when I landed in the Istanbul Airport. The coverage was excellent when we travelled to other places like Cappadocia, Ephesus, etc. I could also check the usuage via Nomad app. Good value for money. Highly recommended.

Review.Titre: Vacay Data
Review.Contenu: Easy to set up,  inexpensive cost, and it lasted for my entire 25-day vacation through multiple EU countries.

Review.Titre: Great for France travel
Review.Contenu: This was great for a week stay in France. Chose 10GB of data and the trip went smoothly thanks to online navigation, checking in and contacting airbnb hosts, etc. Would highly recommend!

Review.Titre: Excellent access even in remote areas…
Review.Contenu: Excellent access even in remote areas of Costa Rica

Review.Titre: Never used an esim before
Review.Contenu: Never used an esim before, and actually brought a 2nd phone with me, luckily someone in the group I was travelling with showed me this app, and it has been seamless.

Review.Titre: Works as described
Review.Contenu: Honestly, I just installed esim and forgot about it. Worked perfectly fine in Japan. Signal everywhere with no lag. I will use nomad on my next trip. Thx

Review.Titre: Nomad ESim Highly Recommended!
Review.Contenu: Have never used an ESim before but went to the US for a few days and wanted to have data without running up huge data roaming charges. The Nomad ESim was fantastic. Easy to set up, no issues with coverage and made life a lot easier! Would highly recommend and will definitely be using Nomad again on my next trip abroad!

Review.Titre: Great!
Review.Contenu: With my new eSIM iPhone, I needed data while traveling overseas. While my family recommended Airalo, they were consistently 30% more expensive than Nomad. I will be using Nomad for their their great value.

Review.Titre: Does exactly what it says it will
Review.Contenu: Does exactly what it says it will. Great travel accessory!

Review.Titre: Best value for money I've ever experienced
Review.Contenu: The 5G/LTE speed was consistent all throughout the experience.  There was no downtime and no throttling of speed unlike other mobile data plans for travelers.  And the best thing is the price.  I've been traveling for leisure two to three times a year for over 20 years and this is the best value for money for mobile data I've ever experienced!

Review.Titre: Nomad eSIM for a US trip
Review.Contenu: Bought a Nomad eSIM for a US trip (visiting from Europe). Everything was perfect, from the purchase and the instructions to the actual quality and performance in the States. The app is a nice touch, too. Highly recommended

Review.Titre: Used the e-sim for my trip in Asia
Review.Contenu: Used the e-sim for my trip in Asia, it was easy to set up and honestly worked great! Have ordered another one for the continuation of my Asia trip, and took advantage of the Black Friday sale to buy an e-sim for a trip later on in Africa.

Review.Titre: Easy to use - Reliable
Review.Contenu: This is my 2nd time using Nomad.  My 1st experience was 30 days for Europe.   This time was 1 week in the US.  Both times I found the plan easy to purchase, easy to load and no issues at all with the data plan. Worked like a charm.  I like that you are able to check your usage and notifications are sent when you're close to 100% use.  Easy to top up.

Review.Titre: Easy to install and had absolutely no…
Review.Contenu: Easy to install and had absolutely no issues using it in India. in fact, my friends had to hotspot my data to get a better connection that their portable router

Review.Titre: Nomad ESIM was awesome and affordable.
Review.Contenu: Great website that explained everything! Activated as it should have once crossing  into Canada. Service even in some remote areas while hiking.

Review.Titre: Enjoying the eSIM … still using it.
Review.Contenu: Enjoying the eSIM … still using it.. I’m in India and feel good that I can communicate with everyone ..

Review.Titre: Nomad eSIM on a new IPhone15Pro.
Review.Contenu: Once I did a full network reset on my new IPhone15 the Nomad eSIM service worked seamlessly with my existing SIM and WiFi. Prior to doing the network reset the eSIM service would drop each time the iPhone went into screen lock.No issues with connectivity travelling around KL and Melaka in Malaysia.

Review.Titre: It couldn't have been easier!
Review.Contenu: It couldn't have been easier!I got 2 eSIM plans for 1 week to use in Tokyo, at 1GB each (20-25 Nov). It, really, was more than enough for our time there. The online transaction was very clear and easy to follow. I shopped around for the same or similar plan and found Nomad's price to be exceptionally better. The app was helpful in keeping track of usage, even with multiple eSIMs under one account. The 2nd one was installed in my daughter's phone. I didn't know if usage for both would be visible when I got the plans, but they were! Installation instructions were simple and activation happened automatically. Thank you, Nomad!

Review.Titre: The e-sim was very easy to install data…
Review.Contenu: The e-sim was very easy to install data service was reliable for our 30 day Italy package.

Review.Titre: The setup of the eSIM on my iPhone…
Review.Contenu: The setup of the eSIM on my iPhone worked well with the provided instructions. 3 GB for 1 week in Morocco were optimal and basically everywhere I had good 4G connection with the main provider Moroc Telecom. 👍🏽At 20% remaining data, I received an email with the option to add more.Tracking of data use in the app and after a reset in the iPhone's setting - mobile data worked well to keep an eye on the usage.

Review.Titre: This app solves a real problem - it's a Game changer!
Review.Contenu: This app solves a real problem and I would rate with 10 stars if I could! So glad, that I found it for my travels in India. It's a game changer and disrupts finally the embarrassing expensive market of Vodafone & Co. I booked 3GB for 8$, but recommended to check Tiktok before to get a promo code which saves you 3-5 $. It was easy access and very user friendly. Will use this definitely again! Thank you so much Nomad team!

Review.Titre: Oh so simple
Review.Contenu: I found Nomad via a simple eSim google :-)So easy to follow and the documentation was 1st class. Bought the 30 day 3Gb package for a visit to Dubai. (from th UK) The eSim activates once you reach your destination. Only used 1.5 Gb of my allowance; coverage 100% - Cost me $11 - absolute bargin!

Review.Titre: Straight forward & reliable
Review.Contenu: So easy to order & install their eSIMs, great instructions & an app, too. Have only used their services in New Zealand & Malaysia but have had no issues in either country. Will definitely use again!

Review.Titre: Travelled to the USA from Canada
Review.Contenu: Travelled to the USA from Canada, and first time using Nomad. Worked great. One week traveling:  Las Vegas, Bryce Canyon, Grand Canyon, Sedona, Phoenix and had great coverage. Sometimes service dropped to 2 bars but that’s expected in some mountainous areas. Sent WhatsApp messages while hiking in Bryce and Grand Canyons. The app makes it easy to check how much data you’ve used. Loved that we could hotspot my husband’s phone as well.

Review.Titre: Very nice service
Review.Contenu: Travelled to India. Easy installation and easy everything, I had no problem whatsoever. I can only strongly recommend it!

Review.Titre: Nomad provided exactly what I needed…
Review.Contenu: Nomad provided exactly what I needed i.e. a reasonably priced, once-off prepaid data bundle in the USA, via an e-sim, which allowed me to continue using whist roaming, my home country physical voice sim card.

Review.Titre: Excellent coverage
Review.Contenu: Great service, excellent coverage, absolutely no issues.I used the service for 15 days in NY, VA, MA, PA, and NJ. I was always connected and with good reception.

Review.Titre: Perfect for globetrotters like me
Review.Contenu: I am traveling the world and Internet is a must. So Roaming is important and with Nomad it is easy and affordable to have Internet around the world. With my Pixel 8pro I had never issues to download load the e-sim.  In the past I used other e-sim provider and checked price, but now use only Nomad easy to use working all good.

Review.Titre: Reliable 5G in Singapore
Review.Contenu: Got the 3GB eSIM for my 11 days in Singapore. The 5G service was via Singtel. Very reliable in my experience.

Review.Titre: Nomad in UK, Spain and Portugal.
Review.Contenu: We used Nomad to provide data while travelling around UK, Spain and Portugal. I was very impressed with the whole setup. We purchased eSIMS, installed them on Android phones and everything just worked. The speed was great and we always seemed to connect to the fastest service provider. The price was easy on the wallet as well.

Review.Titre: Easy to install works great and you can…
Review.Contenu: Easy to install works great and you can hotspot with it no problem!The deal was 10 days 10Gb. Well I had 10 full days as I started on the 3rd in the afternoon and it worked until the 14. I have tried many e-sims and this one is BY FAR the best product out there. I will always choose NOMAD eSIM's for my travels. 100%

Review.Titre: I used the Nomad eSIM in China
Review.Contenu: I used the Nomad eSIM in China. Worked fine there, after I figured out that Roaming needs to be turned on for the eSIM, even though I‘ve been in China using a China Telecom eSIM. High speed, no issue to use VPN. All good and better then expected!

Review.Titre: Very easy and effective
Review.Contenu: Very easy and effective - better than my experience with Airalo by far.

Review.Titre: Easy installation, good performance
Review.Contenu: Buying and activating this Nomad esim was quick and easy. It provided good data coverage in most locations in New Zealand - less so on the highway out in the countryside, but that's to be expected. Overall a good experience for a traveler.

Review.Titre: Overall a reliable data connections
Review.Contenu: Overall, a great way to travel through Europe with reliable connections. I may have at times experienced bad reception but survived the trip nonetheless. Will subscribe again for sure when needed.

Review.Titre: So convenient
Review.Contenu: So convenientIt’s been really easy flying from country to country and not worrying about your data and sim. Coverage has been really good and great speed. I love getting off the plane and walking past the long lines waiting to get their SIM cards. I would definitely get this esim again :)

Review.Titre: Incredibly easy to purchase
Review.Contenu: Incredibly easy to purchase, install and use.  Just the right plan for my purpose so I could use Google, interactive maps and what's app on my short visit to NYC.  Thanks

Review.Titre: Very good network coverage 4G & 5G certain areas
Review.Contenu: Very good network coverage and in some areas I get 5G.  Secondly, I can tether with my laptop.

Review.Titre: Travel to China was Excelent!
Review.Contenu: It was really simple and secure during my travel to China, I have internet connection where ever  Ihave found my self, and this is very important when you find yourself alone sometimes! especially in China.

Review.Titre: Excellent service, competitive price
Review.Contenu: Competitive price, excellent service. I was using their eSim in China and it worked like a charm, together with access to services otherwise unavailable in China. Will definitely use their services again!

Review.Titre: Was easy to install very good well priced…
Review.Contenu: Was very easy to install and works well with existing chip if you turn roaming off. Will use it anywhere I don’t have cover on my phone contract.

Review.Titre: APAC esim works well in mainland China
Review.Contenu: The APAC esim worked fairly well.  It worked in Singapore, Hong Kong, and parts of mainland China (Shenzhen, Chaozhou, Puning).  It did not work well in Huizhou.  Maybe just an issue with providers in the area?However, good enough that I bought a second one for the second part of my trip in mainland China.

Review.Titre: Very happy with Nomad esim coverage in Japan.
Review.Contenu: I purchased two 10GB, 30 day Nomad esim plan for my wife and myself 2 weeks prior to leaving on our trip to Japan from New Zealand. We both have Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra 5G smart phones.I do not know much about esims so it did take me more time than necessary, even though I followed instructions. I was able to work out what the instructions meant in the end. The instructions could have been a little clearer with regard to turning on esim for mobile data. I had to read in between the lines a bit.The activation step could also have been clearer. I turned on the esim just before I left home (while I had access to wifi. Very important to have wifi). When I landed in Japan the esim connected to the Internet and I was able use social media apps, WhatsApp and Messenger  use Google Maps etc.Coverage was excellent. Internet speed was very good. Two more days left in our 20-day trip we both each still have 8GB of data available. We got the 10GB plan to be on the safe side. It was the smallest plan. Nomad was recommended to me by my daughter. I have no hesitation recommending this esim (for Japan at least).

Review.Titre: I bought 2 esims to be used in 2 phones…
Review.Contenu: I bought 2 esims to be used in 2 phones for hong kong trip. I was very happy with it.  It allowed me to use map to explore hongkong for 4 days and discovered more places than the locals.  Totally recommended!

Review.Titre: Great data service.
Review.Contenu: Excellent service, easy to install, use and buy. Super reliable so great for navigating the streets of Hong Kong.

Review.Titre: So easy to use and the quality of the…
Review.Contenu: So easy to use and the quality of the data signal was consistent and effective.

Review.Titre: Fantastic find for all travelers!
Review.Contenu: Easy to follow instructions on how to purchase & install & worked like a dream! I have used a Nomad data package in Canada (Nova Scotia) and in the US (Florida) now & both times were a blessing!

Review.Titre: User friendly
Review.Contenu: User friendly Very good receptions in mainland China, HK, Taiwan,Singapore, and Penang, Heading out to Thailand  & Vietnam. That regional package works out great

Review.Titre: Worked flawlessly
Review.Contenu: No issues at all and good signal everywhere in Vietnam. Be aware that local ESIM cards are cheaper, but quality may vary.

Review.Titre: The USA eSIM I bought worked as…
Review.Contenu: The USA eSIM I bought worked as advertised. It took only a few minutes to set up, and worked perfectly for the entire duration of my trip. No complains whatsoever.

Review.Titre: Used on China
Review.Contenu: Used on China. The internet speed was fast and reliable in all locations. Easy to setup and easy to connect. Highly recommended and will use on all future trips

Review.Titre: Excellent connectivity
Review.Contenu: Connectivity is decent without any interruptions.Works well when you have no WiFi.

Review.Titre: Good speed and reception
Review.Contenu: Good speed and reception. I was able to use it in Seoul, Macau, Hong Kong, Taipei, Tokyo. Really glad I got this. The price was good. Didn’t have to buy new plan when going to different countries. I had a Layover in Tokyo for 8 hours and use google map to travel to shibuya in downtown to kill some time. Was great that I didn’t need to purchase another plan. I did lose 1 hour signal in Taipei and thought it die on me. Luckily it came back in an hour. I was worried and was looking to get another local plan but then it came back and was great afterwards. So no complains.

Review.Titre: Efficient Experience
Review.Contenu: The experience overall was smooth and simple and efficient, when I reached my destination and got out of the airplane, I just switched on the e-sim and I was good to go, the price as compared to the local sims was much more affordable.

Review.Titre: Very good and effective app for…
Review.Contenu: Very good and effective app for roaming.  Prompt response on my query.  Thanks guys.  We need more apps like this. Kudos to your team.

Review.Titre: Best costumer service ever
Review.Contenu: The best costumer service I've ever gotten for anything!  I had trouble activating it on my phone.  It was to the point I had given up, thinking it was only $40.  They kept getting a hold of me when they saw I wasn't active.  Finally, after lots of back and forth we got it.  Thanks to all the Nomad folks for all your help!  Keep up the great work.

Review.Titre: Easy n convenient
Review.Contenu: Easy n convenient! Hassle free.

Review.Titre: Smooth experience
Review.Contenu: Smooth experience, easy to buy and activate, worked in Morocco without any problems.Will use again instead of a physical sim

Review.Titre: Very easy to set up and super…
Review.Contenu: Very easy to set up and super affordable option if you aren't using a ton of data to stream videos

Review.Titre: Great service
Review.Contenu: Great service. Easy to setup. Used it for multuple cuntries and worked excellent. Saved lots of money for roaming charges.

Review.Titre: No issues with contacting others
Review.Contenu: No problems staying in touch with family back home. Great cellphone coverage.

Review.Titre: Highly recommend Nomad eSIM
Review.Contenu: Highly recommend Nomad eSIM! Purchased 10GB data for Dubai and found the activation process seamless. The network coverage was reliable, but for enhanced functionality in Dubai, consider using a Pin VPN to unlock calls on WhatsApp and Messenger. Overall, a solid choice for hassle-free connectivity.

Review.Titre: Excellent Service and easy to use
Review.Contenu: Plan hasn’t finished but it instantly connected on arrival and the speed has been flawless. Will be using again

Review.Titre: Worked like a charm
Review.Contenu: Worked like a charm. Will highly recommend,  especially here in India. We found it nearly impossible to get a local SIM card. They wanted a local number and person to vouch for you, and then they would POST the Sim to you.   No good when you are on  a tour!Thanks for this great product!

Review.Titre: Easy to use
Review.Contenu: Easy to use, nice special offers, works perfectly.

Review.Titre: Easy and convenient
Review.Contenu: Easy to activate, perfect covarage and good speed. 20$ for 10GB is a nice deal.

Review.Titre: Quick to set up and intuitive
Review.Contenu: I was able to set up Nomad e-SIM card at the airport from my phone got a discounted 20 Gb in Asia for 45 days for 30€. When landed it began working instantly. Be sure to turn off your original data roaming and switch to Nomad e-SIM. After two weeks in Asia I still have a ton of data left. Thank you!

Review.Titre: I used Nomad on a recent trip to…
Review.Contenu: I used Nomad on a recent trip to Florida. Excellent coverage and easy to use. Not to mention a great deal! And....I didn't miss all the useless cell calls and texts while on holidays. Love it!

Review.Titre: Excellent product
Review.Contenu: Excellent product. Great prices. Good customer service.  Would definitely use again, easy to use!

Review.Titre: Would buy again
Review.Contenu: Cheapest option we found for our needs. Easy to purchase and install. Connection was great throughout the trip. I would buy from Nomad again.

Review.Titre: Like using only one phone
Review.Contenu: Like using only one phone. Withou chancing memory cards.   Was in USA, Brazil and now in Chile.  Easy to use.   No problems. 💪😎🌟

Review.Titre: Super easy set up and work installation…
Review.Contenu: Super easy set up on iPhone 13 and worked great without any issues and instand as soon as we landed in NYC. Also the app is helpful. 10/10

Review.Titre: Good Option
Review.Contenu: The Sim worked seamlessly while in multiple countries in Europe. Activation was easy and got 5G in most places.

Review.Titre: Painless experience
Review.Contenu: From purchase to set up and actual use has been all painless and easy. Will use it again when I travel to different countries

Review.Titre: This service is very worthy and you…
Review.Contenu: This service is very worthy and you save a lot of money, 5G internet all time.

Review.Titre: Great eSIM data service product
Review.Contenu: Quick and easy setup for the eSIM data service. The usage experience was great. Data doesn't seem to be used very quickly even though to my feeling it should have been used up faster. Great product. Power to the team.

Review.Titre: Easy to install and top-up
Review.Contenu: Easy to install and top-up.  Affordable.

Review.Titre: Easy to add extra countries on the fly
Review.Contenu: Easy to add extra countries on the fly. Connection speeds were great. Pricing options clear and understandable
